rules_text: Horizon Wayfarer’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of differently named lands you control.
notes:
!new !spoiler11
!v0.2
Full Rework:
Old —> Menagerie Pack Leader, G, Creature — Human Shaman, Trample, Whenever Menagerie Pack Leader deals combat damage to a player, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. Then, if you control five or more Forests, create a 2/2 green Bear creature token., 1/1
New —> Horizon Wayfarer, 1G, Creature — Elf Scout, Horizon Wayfarer’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of differently named lands you control., */*
